story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Iran, there lived a young girl named Layla. Layla was a kind and curious little girl who loved exploring the world around her. She had a big heart and a sense of wonder that always led her on exciting adventures.

One evening, as Layla sat under the starlit sky, she noticed a shooting star streaking across the heavens. Excited by this magical sight, Layla closed her eyes and made a special wish. She wished for courage, wisdom, and the ability to help others in need.

The next morning, when Layla woke up, she found a mysterious gift waiting for her outside her window. It was a beautiful lantern with intricate patterns and vibrant colors. The lantern seemed to glow with a warm, gentle light that filled Layla's heart with joy.

Curious and eager to discover the secret of the lantern, Layla embarked on a journey across the land of Iran. Along the way, she met kind strangers who welcomed her into their homes, shared stories and delicious meals with her, and guided her on her path.

As Layla ventured deeper into the heart of her country, she encountered challenges and obstacles that tested her courage and wisdom. But with the help of the lantern's guiding light, she overcame every obstacle and continued her journey with determination and grace.

Finally, after many days of traveling, Layla reached the top of a majestic mountain. There, beneath the glittering stars and the crescent moon, she discovered a hidden garden filled with exotic flowers, singing birds, and a magical pool of shimmering water.

In the center of the garden stood a wise old owl, who greeted Layla with a knowing smile. The owl revealed that the lantern was a gift from the stars, designed to guide those with pure hearts on a path of kindness and compassion.

Filled with gratitude and a sense of fulfillment, Layla returned home with the lantern, ready to light up the lives of others with her newfound courage and wisdom.

And from that day on, Layla's light shone brightly, bringing warmth and hope to all who crossed her path, making her the brightest star in the sky of Iran.

As Layla drifted off to sleep that night, she knew that the lantern would always guide her on new adventures and that her heart would forever be filled with the magic of the stars.

And so, dear little one, remember that no matter where life may take you, there will always be a light to guide you home. Goodnight, sweet Layla, and may your dreams be filled with wonder and joy.
